1 Deviation Report
DOCUMENT NO.: DEV-SYN-4737 REVISION: 1.0
PRODUCT NAME: Nitroso Aryl Piperazine Quetiapine
PRODUCT CODE: VE009S54
BATCH NO.: VOY756
LOT NO.: LOT-APR-003
MANUFACTURING SITE: SynTech Pharmaceuticals Inc.
MANUFACTURING LINE: Line 4 – Injectable Fill Line
DATE RANGE: 2025-04-15 to 2025-04-24
QA REVIEWER: Priya Desai
Deviation Summary Table
Deviation ID Date Type Description Impact CAPA ID
Level
DEV-003 2025-04-18 Process Temp excursion during Minor CAPA-003
filtration
DEV-004 2025-04-16 Documentation Missing initials on Minor CAPA-004
volume fill log
DEV-005 2025-04-17 Equipment Pump-210 pressure spike Moderate CAPA-005
DEV-006 2025-04-19 Environmental ISO 7 room particle Moderate CAPA-006
count exceeded
DEV-007 2025-04-20 Material Incorrect label on raw Major CAPA-007
Handling material container
Comments:
All deviations were logged per SOP-DEV-302. CAPAs initiated and tracked. No batch rejection
required.
1

Level | CAPA ID |

filtration | Minor | CAPA-003 |

count exceeded | Moderate | CAPA-006 |
| DEV-007 | 2025-04-20 | Material
Handling | Incorrect label on raw
material container | Major | CAPA-007 |



Deviation Report 2
Root Cause Analysis
DEV-003: Temperature Excursion
• Cause: HVAC fluctuation
• Corrective Action: HVAC recalibrated
• Preventive Action: Monthly HVAC checks
• CAPA ID: CAPA-003
• Status: Closed
DEV-004: Missing Initials
• Cause: Operator oversight
• Corrective Action: Log updated and verified
• Preventive Action: Refresher training on documentation SOP
• CAPA ID: CAPA-004
• Status: Closed
DEV-005: Pump Pressure Spike
• Cause: Valve misalignment
• Corrective Action: Valve replaced
• Preventive Action: Pre-use valve check added to checklist
• CAPA ID: CAPA-005
• Status: Closed
DEV-006: Particle Count Exceeded
• Cause: Improper gowning technique
• Corrective Action: Area re-cleaned and retested
• Preventive Action: Gowning retraining for staff
• CAPA ID: CAPA-006
• Status: Closed
DEV-007: Incorrect Label
• Cause: Warehouse labeling error
• Corrective Action: Container relabeled and reconciled
• Preventive Action: Barcode verification added to receipt SOP
• CAPA ID: CAPA-007
• Status: Closed
2
